game.s_dis: Bloons Tower Defense 4 is a strategic tower defense game where you place monkey towers, upgrade them, and pop waves of Bloons to prevent them from escaping the track.
game.l_dis:
Bloons Tower Defense 4 ‚Äì Master the Monkey Towers

Bloons Tower Defense 4 (BTD4) is the classic tower defense game where players strategically place monkey-themed towers along the path to stop advancing Bloons. Earn money, upgrade towers, and unlock specialty tools to survive every wave.

What is Bloons Tower Defense 4?

BTD4 expands the original Bloons TD with new towers, upgrades, and tools. Players can unlock Banana Farms, specialty weapons, and other strategic options to enhance their defense. The game features increasingly difficult waves with new Bloon types that require clever placement and upgrading of towers.

How to Play Bloons Tower Defense 4?

  • Place Towers: Position monkeys strategically along the track to pop Bloons.
  • Upgrade Towers: Enhance attack speed, range, and popping power.
  • Earn Money: Pop Bloons to earn cash for new towers and upgrades.
  • Use Specialty Tools: Unlock Banana Farms and weapons to boost strategy.
  • Defend the Track: Prevent Bloons from reaching the end to survive all waves.

Why Play Bloons Tower Defense 4 Unblocked?

Bloons Tower Defense 4 Unblocked allows you to enjoy the strategic monkey defense fun anytime, anywhere‚Äîno downloads or restrictions needed.

Key Features

  • Variety of Towers: Dart, Tack, Ice, Bomb, Super Monkey, and more.
  • Upgrade System: Improve towers for stronger Bloon-popping power.
  • Specialty Tools: Banana Farms, weapons, and other unlocks.
  • Increasing Difficulty: New Bloon types and faster waves challenge your strategy.
  • Unblocked Access: Play directly in your browser without restrictions.

Stop Every Bloon!

Bloons Tower Defense 4 is the ultimate test of tower placement, strategy, and upgrades. Can you survive every wave and achieve a perfect defense? üêµüéà
